title: Bitfield
description: A celebration of Geist's new Pixel type variant. Glitchy art meets lofi aesthetic.
summary: Generative pixel-grid experience driven by Geist Pixel. Adjust seed, resolution, scale, subdivision, density, noise, warp, and timing. Built as an interactive exploration of the typeface.

title: Snowfall
description: Generative audiovisual instrument: falling snow on screen drives sound. A homage to the norns script “fall.”
summary: You can tweak density, flake size, wind, scale/mood, and dither; there’s also a 16-step drum sequencer with generative fills, stutter, and tone controls. Built with Vite, Canvas 2D, and Web Audio API (no libraries).

title: Terra
description: Three.js terrain generator with ASCII effects and audio reactivity.
summary: A Three.js terrain generator with lots of effects. I've gravitated towards the ASCII effects, and have built in some audio reactivity. It needs a UI refactor, but that's coming soon. Built with Cursor.

title: A surprising gust of air
description: Two-track ambient release on my Inverleith project.
summary: Two-track release featuring samples of my son and wife on my 'Inverleith' project.

title: Of what was
description: Ambient pieces recorded to tape, inspired by nature.
summary: Ambient pieces recorded to tape, inspired by nature throughout Wisconsin. Another music project for my Inverleith project.
